name: The return of the Devourer
description:
This is a jumping game where you have to jump out of the devourers reach, but beware... The higher up you get, the more difficult it wil become.

use wasd or arrows to move and Jump

Tip: dubble jumping will help higher up. 

Things we wanted to add but didnt get the time: Main menu, 8bit sound, background and more.
